info.name: Flight Rising Compact
info.description: Changes to the site layout that allows for easy access to the site navigation and info no matter how far you scroll. Responsive design means that no matter your browser's window size, the navigation and your user info won't go out of view. Also includes some minor QoL fixes. Tested only with chrome, your mileage with other browsers may vary. screenshots: click
info.additionalInfo: Ver 1.1.5 // OCT 26, 2019 screenshots: imgur album. More to come eventually. Major Changes: • Site's main content is now 775px width instead of 950px (unneccessary white space from moving the left column has been removed). • Banner is now smaller overall, but still retains the Flight Rising backgrounds. • Your avatar, username, treasure count, gem count, account settings button, PM Alerts, Friend Requests, and General Alerts, and Site Navigation are now fixed and scroll as you scroll. • Use of @media rules ensure that your user info and the navigation is never out of view no matter the size of the browser window (the menu will scroll instead of going off the page, etc). Minor Changes: (see hi res screenshots for visual examples of most of these) • Styled scrollbars • Scrollbar will only appear when necessary when listing items and dragons on AH. • Fixed issue with bestiary descriptions not scrolling when they should. • Centered equipped apparel/skins on dragon profiles, and scrollbar should only show when necessary. • Scrollbar will only show when necessary on the lineage of exalted dragons. • Removed rounded forum post corners (see code comments if you don't want this). • Lessended space between forum posts. • Minor aesthetic changes to clan profiles and comments. • Fixed weird issues with footer on Swipp's Swap Stand. Compatability: ✔ Flight Rising: Highlight Swipp & Baldwin Items v2 ✔ Flight Rising: Swipp & Baldwin Item Counts ✔ FR Festival Reminder ✘ Flight Rising Global Fixes ✘ Simple Dark Theme for Flight Rising ✘ Flight Rising: Move status box Changelog • OCT 26, 2019: ver 1.1.5 released   - updated all affected URLs to HTTPS   - added scrollbar styling for mozilla firefox   - all scrollbars found within site content will be thin from now on   - removed outdated bestiary code   - added new code so that bestiary descriptions will scroll if the description gets long instead of breaking out of bounds • MAY 29, 2019: ver 1.1.4 released   - Fixed problem with alerts being covered by sidebar. • SEPT. 14, 2018: ver 1.1.3 released   - Adjusted user profile spacing/aes a 2nd time. Your clan profile will look consistent with other clans' profiles now (just without the interaction buttons). I also made it so the 'show more friends' will always be in the bottom right corner of the friends div if you have less than 5 friends. • SEPT. 14, 2018: ver 1.1.2 released   - Adjusted user profile spacing/aes changes to account for the new clan profile interaction buttons • SEPT. 10, 2018: ver 1.1.1 released   - added compatibility for FR Festival Reminder • SEPT. 8, 2018: ver 1.1.0 released   - reworked a large chunk of small screen mode (see screenshots).   - re-styled scrollbars, there are now 2 types.   - made slight adjustments to bestiary description padding.   - fixed not being able to click on the ticker. • SEPT. 8, 2018: ver 1.0.1 released   - minor fix for issue with the footer on the dominance page • SEPT. 4, 2018: ver 1.0 released Known Bugs • On ww1 pages you can click the empty space directly to the right of the alerts button to open the alerts dropdown. Idk why this happens, but it doesnt cover anything up or mess with anything else, so who knows.
